events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car on the highway resulting in moderate damage to the front bumper.
Claim categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report and insurance policy details.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the case promptly for faster resolution.
Customer informed that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurer.
Requested customer to submit the police report, photos of the damage, and medical bills for verification.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report and pictures of the carâ€™s damage.
The investigation into the auto accident claim began to verify the circumstances and extent of loss.
Investigation concluded confirming that the insured was not at fault and damage estimate is accurate.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and rental car expenses.
Customer responded positively, appreciating the transparent communication and timely updates.
Claim officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
Payment issued to the customer's designated bank account promptly to facilitate vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed.
All claim records and related documents were archived securely for future reference and audit.
